title: The Case of the missing chickows: adding positive and negati
brief_description: Presents the mysterious didappearance of curious creatures called chickcows to introduce students to pairing as a procedure for adding positive and negative integers. Story by E.D. Bogas and Mitch Rose. Animation by Mitch Rose. Suitable for upper primary level.
